title: Easter Bunnies
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and cook the planted.pulled for 5-6 minutes until heated through.
Use bunny-shaped cookie cutters to cut bunny shapes from the burger bun tops.
Toast the bunny-shaped bun pieces lightly until golden.
Spread mayo or hummus on the bun bases and top with salad greens.
Add the warm planted.pulled on top and place the bunny-shaped bun as a lid.
Decorate with olive slices for eyes and carrot sticks for ears, serve immediately.
